category: National Sports Festival Regulations/Article 26 (Host Executive Committee)
contents: Article 26 (Host City Executive Committee) ① The Organizing Committee shall form an Executive Committee with personnel related to the host city/province to carry out actual competition preparation work. ② The chairperson also serves as the chairperson of the organizing committee, and the vice-chairpersons are appointed by the chairperson, including the vice-president of the metropolitan government of the host city, the superintendent or deputy superintendent of education of the host city/province, and the president of the sports association of the host city/province. Revised on July 29, 2020. ③ The working departments of the Organizing Committee shall be organized according to the circumstances of the venue, and shall include the Competition Department, Ceremony Department, Protocol Invitation Department, Manpower and Materials Department, Public Relations Department, Volunteer Department, Entry/Exit Management Department, and Safety Management Department (including order). ), traffic security department, and welcome information department. ④ The rank of the head of the working department is determined according to the circumstances of the venue. [Title revised on January 24, 2022]
